extension.news: [B][COLOR red]Update - v6.5.0 - Feb. 21, 2022[/COLOR][/B] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] [B]"Force Trakt Sync to local database"[/B] will now [B]"DROP"[/B] existing table vs. simply re-writing new table data. This now assures a safe guard against any database issues that may have previously occurred and re-creates the table and data from scratch.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Fixed AD [B]"Browse debrid pack"[/B] not working on items noted from previous release with resolve issue.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Fixed AD [B]"Browse debrid pack"[/B] would remove cloud item regardless of setting to [B]"Store resolved items in cloud"[/B].[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Fixes to AD cloud scraper failing to return episode for some random cases.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Fixed issue where tvdb ID could be missing from meta providers for shows and would fail to mark as watched/unwatched. Now both imdb and tvdb ID's are checked to better assurance of proper marking of watched/unwatched.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] A new fallback method is in place to better handle missing ID's and will utilize trakt ID's when needed.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Fixed issue where "argv[0]" would randomly fail to add plugin path to created .strm files. The plugin path is now hardcoded.[/I]
